dcterms:creator: Y. LeCun
L. Bottou
Y. Bengio
P. Haffner
dcterms:description: MNIST dataset contains 70K hand-written digits of 28 × 28 pixel size, ranging from ‘0’ to ‘9’. The dataset is split into a 60K training set (including a 5K validation set) and a 10K test set.
dcterms:title: MNIST

dcterms:creator: Alex Krizhevsky
dcterms:description: CIFAR-10 dataset contains 60K color images (size 32 × 32) with each image containing a natural object. There are 10 categories of objects in total, with each category containing 6K images.
dcterms:title: CIFAR-10

dcterms:creator: Tsung-Yi Lin
Michael Maire
Serge Belongie
James Hays
Pietro Perona
Deva Ramanan
Piotr Dollár
C. Lawrence Zitnick
dcterms:description: Microsoft COCO dataset is used for image recognition, segmentation, and captioning. It contains a training set of 83K images with 605K annotations and a validation set of 40K images with 292K annotations.
dcterms:title: Microsoft COCO
